title: (x) Help finding a similar font to the one attached - Melior, ITC Zapf Book {Nina S, Rainer, Mark S}
content:
Hay - a call for help!  
I need to find a font similar to one have attached.  
A client have asked me to use this font, but the problem is that it's a custom font, licened only to a single company.  
I haven't been able to find an alternative font that she like - so now i am hooping for your help!

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font\_prove.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416044717/http:/typophile.com/files/font_prove.png) | 18.96 KB |
author: Smukke Arne

comments.content: Hm, [Melior](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416044717/http:/www.linotype.com/1222/melior-family.html) has some similarities, but it's less Modern.

Reminds me of [Melior](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416044717/http:/www.identifont.com/show?RI) by Hermann Zapf.

EDIT: late again …

Thanks for the help! They both look similar - but i especialy like zapf book - it have more of the 'fun' part like the spur on the g and the string on the a.

Thanks for the great help - i knew i could count on you :)
